    Knife great chopping much handle cut Chef Dexter easier Excellent

  • Arrange by 

    1 out of 1 found this review helpful

    Fantastic price for a very handy knife! The large non- slip handle is extremely comfortable, and the blade's deep belly makes rocking/chopping super fast. Two minor downsides: it needed a quick touch-up to get the blade as sharp as I wanted (out of the package it was still sharper than the crummy rack knives at work, though). The handle is so big, it might be a tight squeeze into your knife roll

    Ben B. Posted on 02/14/2015

    1 out of 1 found this review helpful

    Awesome knife for basically everything - I'm getting another one !! I even have higher end Global knives but use this one all the time now since I've purchased it here for a great price. Excellent value. Thanks!!

    Dexter S. Posted on 11/27/2014

    This knife looked strange to me but I was convinced by the item description. If you are in need of a versatile and durable knife, this is an excellent knife for all your cutting needs. I would definitely recommend this!

    Jean H. Posted on 01/22/2018

    fantastic product! Dexter Russell makes great knives. This has been my knife of choice for a few years now. Has a great grip and sharp blade. I've gotten several as gifts for family and friends!

    Josh N. Posted on 07/29/2017

    This knife is solid. It is a great deal and cuts very well. Hasn't rusted on me and takes an edge pretty easily. Weird looking but good.

    Ryan P. Posted on 03/28/2017

    Feels good in the hand!

    We go through alot of cut work with melons and other large fruits, this knife really helps the less knife capable employees cut items at fairly good rates and with much better and safer control. People with decent knife skills probably won't see nearly as much benefit over a traditional chef knife for most items needing cut.javascript... Knife quality overall is excellent tho!

    Timothy C. from Union St Diner Posted on 02/24/2017

    This knife is a quality knife but opinions vary here on how much each chef likes the knife. Some do and some don't like the way it feels in their hand, I think it's a very good dicing knife but can be used for almost anything.

    Joel L. Posted on 07/29/2016

    Using the Dexter-Russell 40033 Duo-Glide 8" All-Purpose Chef Knife to cut celery. I am so happy to get this knife. Just look at it. Doesn't it just look amazing. Very glad with the purchase.

    Julia W. from jwhitten31 on Youtube Posted on 03/01/2016

    This is a great value! It is very sharp and has a great grip on the handle. The design is perfect for chopping and dicing veggies.

    Jody H. from Southern Inspirations Catering Posted on 03/06/2014

    This chefs knife is great for everyday use from chopping fresh herbs to onions and even garlic. The design makes it much easier to use the knife faster. Much easier on your wrist.

    Eric K. Posted on 09/09/2013

    I adore this chef's knife. It's so easy to use and I love how it centers the pressure from my hand over the food to make for easier chopping.

    Helene W. Posted on 05/28/2013

    I love the handles of Dexter Russell brand cutlery!! They are unique and the most comfortable I have found! This knife is great for quick tasks like chopping fresh herbs or slicing meats!!

    Eric K. Posted on 01/28/2013

    all i can say about this knife is "wow" super piece of work fits your hand like a glove and can be used for almost anything

    Randall H. from Randys family restaurant Posted on 12/03/2011
